data.biography: üëáGet Isle Of Snow here

perPostData.comment: So rad to see all the classic, and new, spots that @nicolasmuellair hit @brightonresort , last season! This one in particular. Lift access is the best! Who else does this trick?! ü§Ø You can do it today! Milly is OPEN!! üëÅ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ùÑÔ∏è @absinthefilms üéº: beastie boys / root down (remix version) üì∏: @shanecharlebois @justinalexanderhostyneki

In the spring, summer and fall whenever @frankbourg isn‚Äôt busy getting stronger pouring cement, he‚Äôs cruising on his BMX scoping for the most creative features to get rowdy on when the snow flies. If you‚Äôve been following us on the gram you‚Äôve seen a lot of his long line of heaters on the most creative features out there. 
Our NYC premier of #IsleOfSnow is tomorrow night at the Sneakersnstuff Bar (such a dope spot) and Frank will be there along with @hanzkyle and @shanecharlebois. The party is a fundraiser for Boarding For Breast Cancer and @b4bc will be there to help spread awareness of the importance of early breast cancer detection and teaching us all about the methods for giving yourself or your dear one an exam. This is priceless knowledge.
Ticket includes admission, a drink and ticket for the snowboard raffle. Link in bio. üé•: @brothers_factory #üëÅ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ùÑÔ∏è @absinthefilms @fattire @hitbalm @gnusnowboards @salomonsnowboards @ridesnowboards @neversummerindustries @thesnowboardersjournal @hightimesmagazine @baldfacelodge @snsbar_nyc

Jaeger always represented strength and happiness. This moment sums it up.., first try sending, back to back, and stoking out everyone who witnessed him. He blew minds on a daily basis. His passing is a harsh reminder that things are not always as they appear. It‚Äôs hard to process. May we continue promoting positive life, and help each other in our journeys. ‚ù§Ô∏è Health and Happiness for 2020 üôèüèΩ

‚ÄòMe and you, we‚Äôre gonna fight those narrow minds, make our own rules...‚Äô üì°üì°Burlington!!!üì¢üì¢ it‚Äôs your turn this Thirstday. Come tune in to winter, have your mind blown by @frankbourg‚Äôs part in #isleofsnow and meet him in person at #nectarsburlington. Crack a @fattire for two chances to win two snowboards we‚Äôre giving away that night. üé•: @brothers_factory @lobstersnowboards @troududiable @sessions_mfg @cbdayz @nowbindings @deeluxeboots 
#üëÅ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ùÑÔ∏è @absinthefilms @thesnowboardersjournal @b4bc @baldfacelodge @hightimesmagazine

Happy Weekend ‚ú®‚ú®ü§™‚ùÑÔ∏è‚ú®‚ú® South Lake Tahoe @easygiant concert #IsleOfSnow Premier about to go O double F tonight ‚ú®üññ‚ú®‚ú® üé•: @zachrawles @absinthefilms #üëÅ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ùÑÔ∏è @fattire @wearedaytrip @ridesnowboards @gnusnowboards @b4bc @baldfacelodge @thesnowboardersjournal @hightimesmagazine

@easygiant has been adding mad flavor to Absinthe soundtracks over the past five years and this song for @severinvandermeer‚Äôs part in #isleofsnow is straight fire. As we roll into the final week of the #isleofsnow premier tour on the east coast, we‚Äôve decided to add two extra west coast shows in Tahoe featuring EasyGiant. With all that snow piling up on both sides of the country, what better reason to come out and celebrate our favorite time of year with all your friends? Incline ticket link in bio 
12/4 Incline Village 
12/5 Burlington 
12/6 South Lake Tahoe 
12/6 Stowe 
12/7 NYC üé•: @shanecharlebois @justinalexanderhostynek üéº: @easygiant @fattire @thesnowboardersjournal @b4bc @wearedaytrip @hightimesmagazine

Tonight Only 
@rylandbell @easygiant and #IsleOfSnow all under the same roof at @alibiincline 
Ticket link in bio. üé•: @parkincostain @natecahoon @jonessnowboards @patagonia 
#üëÅ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ùÑÔ∏è @absinthefilms @fattire @wearedaytrip @thesnowboardersjournal @baldfacelodge @b4bc @hightimesmagazine

Great music is a key ingredient in making things timeless and there‚Äôs a good chance that ten years from now, when this song comes on, you will be thinking of @hanzkyle and @aspenrainweaver sessioning these snowed in buildings and Lien Dracula back sevens. So when Hans came to us with a request for this funky groove by Curtis Mayfield, we knew we had to dig deep to see if we could help the planets to align. Hans will be at our Stowe Premier on Friday with @frankbourg and @shanecharlebois and they will also be hitting the Burlington and NYC Premier Parties this week. That crew sounds like a really good time to hang and watch an Absinthe movie with, so if you‚Äôre in the area, give your swipe finger a rest and get out there to share the stoke with a crowd that loves snow too.

Tour details and ticket links in bio. üé•: @shanecharlebois #isleofsnow #üëÅ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ùÑÔ∏è @salomonsnowboards @wearedaytrip @fattire

The first few years of being a parent has a way of REALLY focusing your time. Being a single mom with a young child does the same thing ....expanded exponentially to a level that simply cannot be ‚Äòimagined‚Äô. Filming a high impact video part in just three weeks is unheard of and we can‚Äôt wait to see how Maria will be progressing the possibilities in years to come.  Come get inspired and watch her crush it in #IsleOfSnow at our South Lake Tahoe Premier and @easygiant  Live Music Experience show tomorrow night at @southofnorthbrewing and get ready to progress some possibilities of your own. Ticket link in bio üé•: @whereswalcer @gnusnowboards 
@absinthefilms #üëÅ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ùÑÔ∏è @fattire @wearedaytrip @b4bc @thesnowboardersjournal @hightimesmagazine @baldfacelodge @neversummerindustries @ridesnowboards

@wainosworld played this Devil Makes Three song on the way up to Stevens one morning when we were filming his part last winter. It was an obvious choice right when he first played it. Peep his full part from #isleofsnow featuring @blairhabenicht and @markrainery and hear the rest of this song right now on @thesnowboardersjournal. It will dial in your mood for getting out there tomorrow. Link in profile

If you‚Äôre in Burlington tomorrow come by #clubmetronome for the #isleofsnow premier, meet up with @hanzkyle @frankbourg @shanecharlebois, get down with winter and maybe even win one of the boards we‚Äôre giving away. $5 cover at the door showtime at 8 üé•: @shanecharlebois @hanzkyle @salomonsnowboards @wearedaytrip 
#isleofsnow #üëÅ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ùÑÔ∏è @absinthefilms @fattire @b4bc @thesnowboardersjournal @hightimesmagazine @neversummerindustries @gnusnowboards @ridesnowboards

@mariathomsen @wolfgangnyvelt @chrisrasman @severinvandermeer @meecheladaaa @hanzkyle @dylan_alito @wainosworld @mattbelzile @rustyockenden @jodywachniak @rylandbell @blairhabenicht @markrainery @carlosgerber @broccoleooo @aspenrainweaver @juddhenkes @cholulaindahole @frankbourg @nicolasmuellair

Nothing says freedom, like fireworks and a cabin made for fun! üî•üöÄüéâ @blazesamblaze and @you_wish_levi kick off 2020, with an explosive backflip run, as the ball dropped. üì∏: @seanblack.seanblack (amazing reaction to getting the shot) @arborsnowboards üòä Happy New Years, everyone ‚úåüèΩ

Today we launch IsleOfSnow digitally all over the map.

Thank you to everyone who came out to be a part of our film tour parties around the world. It is good to feel the snowboard community is thriving and it‚Äôs amazing to see how generous winter has been already. We hope it‚Äôs dumping where you are.

data.name: Audi Nines
data.biography:
Unique action sports event series.
#AudiNines
by @the_distillery & NBH Events 
üìçS√∂lden & Obergurgl
Behind The Nines S2E1üëá

perPostData.comment:
Let's look back at one of the most memorable moments of 2K19 where @andriragettli unleashed his first ever Quad Cork 1980!
#audinines #freeskiing #quadcork

Merry Christmas from the whole Audi Nines Family!üéÑSavor and enjoy the holidays, here's a little Christmas stocking stuffer for ya from @andriragettli and @buhsch!

Giving someone a Highfive is an international way of saying hello and at the Audi Nines we like to spice it up a bit!
#audinines #highfive #doubletrouble

Let's get a lil artsy with photographer @david_malacrida capturing @annika.overtomorrow with her exquisite flick and style!
#audinines #snowboarding #photography

Get sendy with the Audi Nines squadron on a heavy train!

The boys dismantled our set up in mere minutes, all angles covered! Tag your shred squad down belowüëá
@andriragettli @lukas.muellauer @nicoporteous @flopreussskiing @mrdavidwise @easytigerz @buhsch 
#audinines #getsendy #squadgoals

@johanneekilli is undoubtably one of the hardest rippers in the game.

She accumulated a ridiculous amount of gnar at the Audi Nines snow jungle with exceptional style and finesse.
üì∏ @klaus_polzer 
#audinines #freeskiing #finesse

Laying down banger after banger, @syrja is something different.

Comin‚Äô in through the ‚ÄúBecome A Nine‚Äù contest, Finland‚Äôs finest got buck at the Audi Nines. Triumphing above the force in Big Air with the help of highly technical wizardy tricks.

Do you want to ride the Audi Nines'20? Make sure you keep an eye out for the upcoming "Become A Nine" Wildcard Contest. More info coming soon!
#audinines #freeskiing #fullsend

Double or triple corks are cool and all, but what about a perfectly executed Method?

Swiss's @janscherrer seamlessly synthesizes proper methods hit after hit! #audinines #method #snowboarding

2019 has been an epic ride where the athletes delivered nothing but Ace's!

We want to give a massive thanks to everyone involved in the 2019 Audi Nines insanity and we can't wait what 2020 is going to deliver! 
See ya in 2020! üí•
#audinines #newyear #freeskiing #snowboarding

Some people are just born to ride the shred sticks, @flopreussskiing is one of them.

Flo is comin' in hot with his powerful style and a unique bag of tricks.
#audinines #freeskiing #getsendy
@elena.gaskell blazes at full throttle no matter the weather, even on the foggy days she kept the torch lit! #audinines #freeskiing #nomattertheweather

@sebbedebuck is an absolute lunatic on snow, and he makes it all looks so damn effortless! 
#audinines #snowboarding #fullsend

The @downdays_eu 2019 Book of Ski Stories is now up for pre-ordering!

After ten years of making magazines to bring together Europe's freeski scene Downdays decided to create an actual hardcover book. Featuring original cover art by @ericrpollard and @chrisbenchetler , in-depth stories from the wide world of skiing and images promised to keep the spirit up, even on down days, now and for seasons to come.

Make sure to hit the link in our bio to get your hands on one of these beauties!

Special thanks to @roykittler @ethanstonephoto @klaus_polzer @sti_goreng 
#downdays #freeskiing #thebookofski

Take a seat, and soak up the stoke!

Our team has been hard at work designing next years' events, but we can't do it alone. The athletes play a huge role in helping to shape each Audi Nines venue. After all, they're the ones who have to ride it!

Link in bio! üëÜ
#audinines #setup #creative #workshop

#audinines #getsendy #squadgoals

Comin‚Äô in through the ‚ÄúBecome A Nine‚Äù contest, Finland‚Äôs finest got buck at the Audi Nines. Triumphing above the force in Big Air with the help of highly technical wizardy tricks.

Do you want to ride the Audi Nines'20? Make sure you keep an eye out for the upcoming "Become A Nine" Wildcard Contest. More info coming soon!
#audinines #freeskiing #fullsend

@johanneekilli is undoubtably one of the hardest rippers in the game.

She accumulated a ridiculous amount of gnar at the Audi Nines snow jungle with exceptional style and finesse.
üì∏ @klaus_polzer 
#audinines #freeskiing #finesse

The @downdays_eu 2019 Book of Ski Stories is now up for pre-ordering!

After ten years of making magazines to bring together Europe's freeski scene Downdays decided to create an actual hardcover book. Featuring original cover art by @ericrpollard and @chrisbenchetler , in-depth stories from the wide world of skiing and images promised to keep the spirit up, even on down days, now and for seasons to come.

Make sure to hit the link in our bio to get your hands on one of these beauties!

Special thanks to @roykittler @ethanstonephoto @klaus_polzer @sti_goreng 
#downdays #freeskiing #thebookofski

Some people are just born to ride the shred sticks, @flopreussskiing is one of them.

Flo is comin' in hot with his powerful style and a unique bag of tricks.
#audinines #freeskiing #getsendy

Double or triple corks are cool and all, but what about a perfectly executed Method?

Swiss's @janscherrer seamlessly synthesizes proper methods hit after hit! #audinines #method #snowboarding

@sebbedebuck is an absolute lunatic on snow, and he makes it all looks so damn effortless! 
#audinines #snowboarding #fullsend
@elena.gaskell blazes at full throttle no matter the weather, even on the foggy days she kept the torch lit! #audinines #freeskiing #nomattertheweather

Take a seat, and soak up the stoke!

Our team has been hard at work designing next years' events, but we can't do it alone. The athletes play a huge role in helping to shape each Audi Nines venue. After all, they're the ones who have to ride it!

Link in bio! üëÜ
#audinines #setup #creative #workshop

Merry Christmas from the whole Audi Nines Family!üéÑSavor and enjoy the holidays, here's a little Christmas stocking stuffer for ya from @andriragettli and @buhsch!

Giving someone a Highfive is an international way of saying hello and at the Audi Nines we like to spice it up a bit!
#audinines #highfive #doubletrouble

Let's look back at one of the most memorable moments of 2K19 where @andriragettli unleashed his first ever Quad Cork 1980!
#audinines #freeskiing #quadcork

2019 has been an epic ride where the athletes delivered nothing but Ace's!

We want to give a massive thanks to everyone involved in the 2019 Audi Nines insanity and we can't wait what 2020 is going to deliver! 
See ya in 2020! üí•
#audinines #newyear #freeskiing #snowboarding

Let's get a lil artsy with photographer @david_malacrida capturing @annika.overtomorrow with her exquisite flick and style!
#audinines #snowboarding #photography

perPostData.comment:
‚ÄúLiving through the early 20th century in Wyoming meant surviving‚Äîboth physically and mentally‚Äîthe long, cold winters. As a means to pass the time, valley residents began to transform skis from tools of utility to opportunities for recreation.‚Äù Brigid Mander writes about the early skiers of Jackson Hole.

___
To learn more about the evolution of skiing in the Tetons, visit backcountrymagazine.com and clink on the link in our bio to grab a copy of the 2019 Photo Annual.

___
Image #1: Tom Lamb ascends Snow King‚Äôs first T-bar. [Photo] Courtesy Jackson Hole Historical Museum

___
Image #2: Fred Brown, former skiing mailman and first president of the Jackson Hole Ski Club, explores the south fork of Cascade Canyon with Reddy Muller. [Photo] Courtesy Elizabeth D. Woolsey Testamentary Trust Collection

#untrackedexperience #contours #thegrandestrange

The Tech: Julbo‚Äôs new Cyrius goggle debuts a frameless style featuring a cylindrical lens, which curves horizontally and runs flat from top to bottom. The shape is intended for a modern look and wide-open field of vision that‚Äôs made crisp and clear by Julbo‚Äôs best-in-class photochromic Zebra lenses.
.
.
The Talk: ‚ÄúI love the style of these goggles,‚Äù the Cyrius tester said. Beyond the fit, he found the lens just right, too, noting, ‚ÄúThe Zebra lenses work great as it‚Äôs getting later in the day, in the clouds or the trees‚Äîthough they aren‚Äôt my favorite in flat light.‚Äù
.
.
$220
@julboeyewearna .
.
Read full reviews of all our 2020 Editors' Choice awarded gear online at BackcountryMagazine.com/EC20
.
.
#untrackedexperience
#backcountrygearguide
#editorschoice
#2020geartestweek
@powdermountain

‚ÄúMore often than not, storms leave cold and clear, giving light to boundless cold smoke,‚Äù says photographer Liam Doran about his southwestern Colorado sliding grounds. @sbrunso plunges into remnants from an earlier storm on Red Mountain Pass. üì∏ @liam_doran_outdoors
#untrackedexperience #spectacle

Bill Briggs, known for his pioneering ski descent of Grand Teton, talks big lines in Jackson and why he wouldn't want to live anywhere else. Read more at backcountrymagazine.com.

In the photo: Mt. Moran‚Äîwhere Bill Briggs trained for his descent of Grand Teton‚Äîis named for frontier landscape artist Thomas Moran. Here, the mountain is photographed at sunrise from Jackson Lake. [Photo] Jack Bauer
#untrackedexperience
#contours
#thegrandestrange

On a multiday adventure through California's Sierra Nevada Mountains, @forrestshearer and Christian Pondella awoke early one morning to thread a granite hallway at daybreak. "We hiked up before sunrise and were rewarded with amazing light as the first rays of the day came beaming into the couloir," Pondella says. üì∏ @christianpondella
#untrackedexperience
#spectacle

"If you want to, you can pretty much do anything you want. I really believe that. I never lacked motivation." ‚ÄîPhotographer @ming.t.poon on what it takes to make it in your dream job. To read more about his art, visit backcountrymagazine.com.

In the image: The Whistler Deep Winter Wizard, better known as @tobinseagel , helped Poon win Whistler, B.C.'s 2019 Deep Winter Photo Challenge. [Photo] Ming Poon
#untrackedexperience
#photoannual

Happy Holidays from the crew at Backcountry Magazine! ‚ÄúNothing like a little hide and seek courtesy of 114 mm shovels,‚Äù photographer Adam Barker quips about Lucy Sackbauer‚Äôs disappearing act, deep within the Teton Mountains near Jackson, Wyo. [Photo] @adambarkerphotography
#untrackedexperience

Jackson resident Betty Woolsey was a woman ahead of her time‚Äîa trait not uncharacteristic of the female set who lived in the Tetons in the mid 20th century. From a spot on the U.S. Olympic team to guiding in Jackson Hole, she expanded the concept of a woman's place in the sport of skiing and served as a role model for those, like current Jackson resident Kim Havell, who continue to push boundaries in Wyoming's high peaks.

In the November 2019 Photo Annual, Havell writes about Woolsey's far reaching influence in the Tetons and beyond. Click on the link in our bio to get your copy of this issue today. 
____

First Image: Betty Woolsey, Margaret ‚ÄúMuggs‚Äù Schultz and Maria ‚ÄúSis‚Äù McKean‚Äîwho were instrumental in guiding and exploring the Tetons in the ‚Äô40s and ‚Äô50s‚Äîat Woolsey‚Äôs Trail Creek Ranch. [Photo] Elizabeth D. Woolsey Testamentary Trust Collection 
____

Second Image: Betty Woolsey shows Alice Damrosch Wolfe Kiaer, manager of the National Ski Association‚Äôs women‚Äôs ski team, the slopes of Teton Pass in front of Mt. Glory. [Photo] Elizabeth D. Woolsey Testamentary Trust Collection 
#untrackedexperience
#contours #thegrandestrange

In the November Photo Annual, Brigid Mander pens the history of one of North America‚Äôs grandest ranges. Wyoming‚Äôs Tetons stand in a mythical shroud for skiers the world over, and have been a proving ground for ski mountaineers looking to push boundaries and test limits. But their allure has a downside‚Äîpopularity, and Mander asks, ‚Äúas the Teton Range turns into a magnifying glass for observing increased pressure that humans have on wild spaces, will this region find its voice and work to retain the hard-charging reputation and access to open space that have long defined its mountains?‚Äù
____

To read more, click on the link in our bio and buy your copy of the November 2019 Photo Annual today.

____

In the photo: From a vantage point looking southwest into Wyoming‚Äôs Snake River Valley, the Grand Teton (13,775 ft.) and Mt. Moran (12,605 ft.) stand as the prominent sentinels of the Teton Range. [Photo] Tristan Greszko

#untrackedexperience #contours #thegrandestrange

The Scarpa Gea RS: off again, on again. And when the switch is between years spent earning an Editors‚Äô Choice Award and a Gear Guide selection, flip-flopping isn‚Äôt too bad.
.
.
Two years ago, Scarpa overhauled the Gea RS and its male counterpart, the Maestrale RS, with Grilamid/carbon construction to reduce the boot‚Äôs weight and to bulk up stiffness to a 120 flex. Also a redesigned shell and liner were incorporated to better fit women‚Äôs wider, lower calves; and an easy-to-grab walk lever aimed to slice down transition times. The redesign netted the Gea an Editors‚Äô Choice for winter ‚Äô17/18, but the boot ceded the podium to the Maestrale last year.
.
.
The Gea‚Äôs major upgrades are again being recognized, including by one long-and-lean tester who found the boot to be ‚Äúsufficiently stiff enough to power skis of all genres and weights. It‚Äôs not the lightest model,‚Äù she admitted, ‚Äúbut it‚Äôs much lighter and more comfortable than the alpine-boot-turned-AT models from traditional alpine brands, and nearly as comfortable.‚Äù And while another tester found the women‚Äôs-specific cut of the liner to run a skosh too narrow through the heel, another found ‚Äúthe out-of-box liner fit secures your Achilles and heel in place with minimal play.‚Äù
.
.
There are new additions to the RS this go-around, too, though they run pretty minimal, like a new power strap that incorporates RECCO technology designed to help in an avalanche burial. Two upper buckles and one lower accompany the techy power strap, and one tester noticed: ‚ÄúA highly effective and efficient buckle design‚Ä¶slightly more aggressive forward lean angle than most.‚Äù
.
.
5.5 lbs.
Last Width: 101 mm
Sizes: 22.5-27
@scarpana
.
.
Read full reviews of all our 2020 Editors' Choice awarded gear online at BackcountryMagazine.com/EC20
.
.
#untrackedexperience
#backcountrygearguide
#editorschoice
#2020geartestweek
@powdermountain

One Conway, N.H.-based avalanche instructor talks about the trouble with overhead avalancher management. Read more at backcountrymagazine.com. 
In the photo: New Hampshire's Oaks Gulf, where David Lottmann's slide occurred, sits below the saddle connecting Mt. Washington (6,288 ft.) and the eastern flanks of Mt. Monroe (5,371 ft.). The slide ran through the trees above and to the looker's left of the prominent white slidepath at the bowl's center. [Photo] @nevinsphoto
#untrackedexperience

On The Cover: Over his long-running career, Lee Cohen has dialed his powder-day routine through the cirques of Utah‚Äôs Wasatch Mountains. ‚ÄúThis was shot at twin Lakes Pass, toward the end of the day on a classic photo circuit, a route I‚Äôve been taking for 25 years that still waxes poetic for me with new looks among the old go-to slam dunks,‚Äù he says of the cover image of @amieski . [Photo]¬†@leecohen_pics

_____

25th¬†Anniversary Issue | #131

It‚Äôs been 25 years since we penned the first issue of¬†Backcountry Magazine, and in this issue, we reflect on the quarter century of stories, photos and the most influential aspects of backcountry skiing and riding that have kept us coming back for another lap. We take a deep dive into our past 130 issues, highlighting stories that have remained timeless throughout the decades,¬†from an account of the first descent of Mt. Robson to Biff America‚Äôs contemplations on life and death‚Äîit‚Äôs an era unbound. Then we celebrate the past and current generation‚Äôs notable places, trends, people and pieces of gear have shaped the sport as we know it, celebrating 43 of the most influential elements that have defined backcountry skiing and riding in North America.¬†Also inside, a profile on backcountry maverick Mike Hattrup, the enduring impact of the Dynafit binding and nine gear must-haves that continue to age with grace.

___
Read more in the 25th Anniversary Issue. Click on the link in our bio to grab your copy, or visit¬†BackcountryMagazine.com/131. 
#untrackedexperience
#25thanniversaryissue

‚ÄúIt‚Äôs always about the journey and the adventure, and the content comes second. I think that‚Äôs allowed him to be one of the best photographers in the business.‚Äù ‚ÄîFreeskier @kalenthorien on photographer Jim Harris‚Äôs ethos.

Read more about Harris and his career at backcountrymagazine.com.

Artist, photographer and adventurer Jim Harris stays fully immersed. [Photo] Courtesy @perpetualweekend
#untrackedexperience

For freeksier @amieski , her dad Jeff has not only been a role model in her ski career, but also a friend and backcountry partner. Learn more about the father/daughter duo at backcountrymagazine.com. üì∏ @amieski 
#untrackedexperience

BackcountryMagazine.com/gifts .

data.name: Blister Review
data.biography:
In-depth product reviews & great conversations about the world of outdoor sports.
‚Ä¢
‚¨áÔ∏è Check out our free Winter Buyer‚Äôs Guide ‚¨áÔ∏è

perPostData.comment:
We‚Äôre not sure that anyone loves skiing more than @tylercurle, and Tyler also happens to be one very hard-charging and versatile skier who has appeared in films from @mspfilms and @tetongravity.

So for the latest installment of our Up & Coming series on our #BlisterPodcast, Tyler came out to Crested Butte and we sat down in Blister HQ to talk about growing up skiing at Mt. Rose; starting to help out at @momentskis at the ripe old age of twelve; his favorite skis, skiers, and ski movies of all time, and a whole lot more. Check it out wherever you get your podcasts, or on our site. (üì∏1-3: @lynk_nation; üì∏4: @lukejacobson)
‚Ä¢
#skiing #metal #punk #eaglesnest #momentskis #upandcomingmua

One of the most common questions we get is something like ‚ÄúI‚Äôm XX tall and weigh XX ‚Äî which length of this ski should I get?‚Äù So in our Gear 101 article, we outline the factors that go into answering that question. Check it out on our site.
‚Ä¢
#blisterreviewed #skis #skiing #visitgcb

The winner of this week‚Äôs Gear Giveaway will get a pair of fully custom skis from @wagnerskis! You‚Äôll go through a consultation process with Wagner to determine the right shape, rocker profile, flex pattern, construction, and graphics for you, and then they‚Äôll build them by hand in Telluride, Colorado. Enter on our site before next Friday, January 3rd for your chance to win.
‚Ä¢

One of the most common questions we get is something like ‚ÄúI‚Äôm XX tall and weigh XX ‚Äî which length of this ski should I get?‚Äù So in our Gear 101 article, we outline the factors that go into answering that question. Check it out on our site.
‚Ä¢
#blisterreviewed #skis #skiing #visitgcb

The winner of this week‚Äôs Gear Giveaway will get a pair of fully custom skis from @wagnerskis! You‚Äôll go through a consultation process with Wagner to determine the right shape, rocker profile, flex pattern, construction, and graphics for you, and then they‚Äôll build them by hand in Telluride, Colorado. Enter on our site before next Friday, January 3rd for your chance to win.
‚Ä¢
#blistergeargiveaway #skis #customskis #skiing #wagnerskis

Last week we talked about the Metamorph, a new ski from @kyepetersen & @foonskis‚Äônew brand, @kyeshapes. Now it‚Äôs time to talk about the big gun in the Kye Shapes lineup, the Numinous. And for many people, we think there could be a lot to like about this big-mountain ski. Check out on the site our video First Look & writeup.
‚Ä¢
#blisterreviewed #skis #skiing #powderskis #kyeshapes #foonskis #numinousski

This season @patagonia launched a new outerwear series, the SnowDrifter, and we‚Äôve come away very impressed by the comfort and versatility of the women‚Äôs SnowDrifter Jacket. Check out our review on the site.
‚Ä¢
#blisterreviewed #outerwear #skiing #snowboarding #backcountryskiing #skitouring #patagoniasnow

We‚Äôve been thinking and talking about New Year‚Äôs resolutions, so in this episode of the #BlisterPodcast, we ask a number of BLISTER reviewers what they‚Äôre pursuing in this new year and new decade. And we‚Äôd love to hear what your plans are for 2020 and beyond, so let us know what your thoughts are on New Year‚Äôs resolutions and what you have planned for 2020. Check it out wherever you get your podcasts, or on our site.
‚Ä¢
#newyears #newyearsresolutions #2020 #360 #running #climateneutral #mtb #skiing

Today we caught our last turns of the decade. Here‚Äôs to all the ski buddies, friends, and family who‚Äôve skied with us, put up with us, and celebrated with us along the way. And here‚Äôs to many great days ahead. üçª
#happynewyear
üì∏: @jonathan.ellsworth

According to @norrona, the Tamok Gore-Tex Pro Jacket is their ‚Äúmost durable jacket for the backcountry freeriders, blending a unique look with uncompromising freeride functionality.‚Äù It‚Äôs quickly become one of our favorite resort shells, and you can check out on the site our full review to see how this high-end jacket compares to the competition. (üì∏: @taylorahrn, taken yesterday üò¨)
‚Ä¢
#blisterreviewed #skiing #outerwear #powder #burythebutte #visitgcb #skijacket #jacket #shell #pow #norrona #tamok

Sometimes, all you want is to be comfortable. It‚Äôs great to have soft, cozy clothing for those days when the main activity is doing no activity at all, and we‚Äôve rounded up several of our favorite men‚Äôs & women‚Äôs comfy tops, bottoms, & slippers. Check them out on our site.
‚Ä¢
#blisterreviewed #comfy #loungewear #slippers #sweatpants #sweatshirt #hoody

The winner of our Gear Giveaway this week will get to pick any ski from @libertyskis‚Äô lineup! That includes their versatile Origin & Genesis freeride skis; piste-oriented "V" series; directional all-mountain Evolv skis; twin tips like the Helix; and even their super-fat pow ski, the Genome. Enter on our site before January 10th for your chance to win.
‚Ä¢
#blistergeargiveaway #skis #skiing #libertyskis

We‚Äôve been skiing @icelantic_skis‚Äô best-selling ski, the Nomad 105, and we now understand why it holds that title. Check out on the site our full review & Deep Dive comparisons.
‚Ä¢
#blisterreviewed #skis #visitgcb #skiing #nomad105 #icelanticskis

Taylor‚Äôs Words. ‚ÄúHi guys here is a compilation of my street snowboard clips from BLP III and Fast Forward Snow this past season. Thank you all very much for providing me with the opportunity to film last year. 
Very excited to be a part of the Nitro, Modest, and L1 family this year, big things to come!! Now for the endless list of thank you‚Äôs (this is my first opportunity to collectively thank all the people that have helped me over the years so read it or don‚Äôt). Thank you Rude Girls for being the best girls crew in the entire world, love you all so much and thank you for your friendship and support ‚ù§Ô∏è Thank you Abby for being the best human being. Thank you for doing so much for women‚Äôs snowboarding and creating such a strong community of females in and around Banff.

Thank you Jordan for helping me out these past few years with gear and connections. I deeply appreciate everything you have done to help me get where I am in snowboarding today. 
Thank you Riders Onboard, Adam, Jared, Max, Torrance, Alison, and Karine for giving me a snowboard family to grow up with and for teaching me that nothing is more important than having fun while I‚Äôm boarding.

Thank you to so many amazing, innovative women in snowboarding that have inspired us to push ourselves and not let a male-dominated industry hold us girls back. So, so many names that I think most people will be able to think of. 
Most importantly, thank you Mom and Dad for supporting me in doing what I love no matter what.‚Äù Filming by:
Jake Whitburn
Taco 
Manu Calvo
Tyler Miller
Robert Anderson 
Maddy Kuss

Taylor‚Äôs Words. ‚ÄúHi guys here is a compilation of my street snowboard clips from BLP III and Fast Forward Snow this past season. Thank you all very much for providing me with the opportunity to film last year. 
Very excited to be a part of the Nitro, Modest, and L1 family this year, big things to come!! Now for the endless list of thank you‚Äôs (this is my first opportunity to collectively thank all the people that have helped me over the years so read it or don‚Äôt). Thank you Rude Girls for being the best girls crew in the entire world, love you all so much and thank you for your friendship and support ‚ù§Ô∏è Thank you Abby for being the best human being. Thank you for doing so much for women‚Äôs snowboarding and creating such a strong community of females in and around Banff.

Thank you Jordan for helping me out these past few years with gear and connections. I deeply appreciate everything you have done to help me get where I am in snowboarding today. 
Thank you Riders Onboard, Adam, Jared, Max, Torrance, Alison, and Karine for giving me a snowboard family to grow up with and for teaching me that nothing is more important than having fun while I‚Äôm boarding.

Thank you to so many amazing, innovative women in snowboarding that have inspired us to push ourselves and not let a male-dominated industry hold us girls back. So, so many names that I think most people will be able to think of. 
Most importantly, thank you Mom and Dad for supporting me in doing what I love no matter what.‚Äù Filming by:
Jake Whitburn
Taco 
Manu Calvo
Tyler Miller
Robert Anderson 
Maddy Kuss

The Downdays 2019 Book of Ski Stories: Pre-order your copy now! (link in bio)
Featuring original cover art by @ericrpollard and¬†@chrisbenchetler and 176 pages full of carefully curated stories and images from the wide world of skiing, this eye-catching hardcover book is Downdays' most ambitious print project yet.
.
After ten years of making magazines to bring together Europe's freeski scene, we decided to flip the script and make an actual book! The Book of Ski Stories contains ten hand-selected articles from across the spectrum of skiing, from profiles and interviews with leading athletes like @hharlaut and @fabian_lentsch, musings on the epic 2019 winter in the Northern Alps by @neilwilliman, a report from the rails of Eastern Europe by the ski crew @el.makrell, to in-depth think pieces on avalanche safety and ski resort sustainability. A special 24-page photo gallery featuring the work of some of skiing's best shooters including @oskar_enander, @alric.ljunghager, @christianpondella and @petermorning rounds out the experience.
.
Our overarching goal: to create something worth holding onto, that will make your down days more enjoyable in the seasons and off-seasons to come.
.
We're very excited to finally share this project with the community and are accepting pre-orders now at the new Downdays webshop (link in bio). Pre-orders will ship beginning on Monday 16 December, in time to reach customers in the E.U. before Christmas.
#skiing #freeskiculture #bookofskiing

"A lot of it comes from my parents," @fabian_lentsch says of his passion for the road. "We traveled a lot around Europe when I was young. For me it‚Äôs normal to get to know new places and be on the road. When I stopped competing, the main reason was definitely to fulfill my desire to explore new places and stop riding in the same ski areas. I absolutely love discovering new perspectives, other languages and other cultures. Of course, after a long trip I‚Äôm always glad to come home, but after a few weeks or months I get restless, and it pulls me away again." Eric created "Vantage" this summer, basing the painting on a still frame from a video captured by drone at his home of Mt. Hood, Oregon. And now for something completely different‚Ä¶ the cover of Issue 5.3 of Forecast, which comes to us from @Kari_Medig, who snapped this shot outside of Thunderhill Ski Area in Manitoba.

Inside you‚Äôll find our 2020 Accessory Guide for all of your Christmas shopping needs, the story behind our recently released video series in conjunction with @ToyotaCanada, True North BC, starring @Anna_Segal, @RileyLeboe and @SimonDartois, a look at urban ski touring high above the hustle and bustle of Vancouver, and The Photo Annual.
In addition to all of that, @CassieSharpe candidly and bravely discusses the expected highs but unseen lows of winning an Olympic gold medal, @RileyLeboe gets reflective at @MustangPowder on New Year‚Äôs Eve with @SamKuch_ and @JRollins01, and up-and-comer @Etienne_Geoffroy chats about his past, present and future. We also delve into the making of @BlankCollectiveFilms‚Äô latest movie, The 7 Stages of Blank, showcase how and why history helps makes @CastleMountainResort such an unsung gem, team up with @SamKuch_ to offer you the chance to win a pair of @Head_Ski Kore 105s, and much, much more.

Follow the link in our profile for a full preview of the issue, which is arriving at ski shops and newsstands across Canada over the coming week.

perPostData.comment: @cjbivo‚Äôs New Year‚Äôs resolution: choke on more pow. @skitownallstars #FREESKIER #ThisIsSkiing #Skiing

When @trevor_kennison was paralyzed from the waist down after a backcountry snowboarding accident four years ago, sit-skiing was just about the last thing on his mind. That is, until his sister encouraged him to give it a try. Just three years into sit-skiing, Kennison has established himself as one of the rowdiest adaptive athletes in the world after the 26-year-old dropped into the industry‚Äôs craziest ski and snowboard competition, Kings and Queens of Corbet‚Äôs @jacksonhole, last February. Sending it alongside some of the best skiers and snowboarders in the game, think @travisrice, @crazy_karl and two-time Queen @caite_zeliff, Kennison went where no sit-skier has gone before, proving the limit to this incredible competition does not exist. IN DETAIL: @dynafit ST Rotation 12 // The Dynafit Rotation 12 is just what ski tourers who put a premium on aggressive descents are looking for. The binding can be set to a release value between 4-12, its Rotation Toe Piece pivots ever so slightly to prevent your toe from prereleasing during bumpy descents and 10 millimeters of elastic travel in the heel accommodates consistent ski flex. All-in-all, the Rotation is about consistency from a safety standpoint. When it comes to ease-of-use, it‚Äôs tough to beat the Rotation 12, thanks to a centering hub with internal bearings in the toepiece that keep the toe jaws in place for easy step-ins. Navigating the world as a young ski bum can be wrought with chaos, pitfalls and trade-offs. It‚Äôs much like the famed exploits of the na√Øve and clumsy island iguana that survives the onslaught of deadly snakes in its quest to reach the sea. In the competitive environment of a ski town, you must find an affordable place to live, secure a job that comes with a season‚Äôs pass and, if you‚Äôre lucky, score a relationship with one of the few single women who live there year-round. Your true imperative, however, remains skiing as much waist-deep powder as possible. Only those skiers with enough skill and cunning will be ready when the time comes, making this so-called potholed road to maturity all worthwhile. And in the aptly named Lizard Range mountain chain surrounding the iconic ski town of Fernie, British Columbia, there is one more hazardous factor ski bums must endure: The Fernie Factor. // Find out what the heck author and photographer¬†¬†@solgephoto is talking about @ferniealpineresort via our Canadian Resort Guide, online now. // #SkiCanada #FREESKIER #ThisIsSkiing #Skiing
@dragonalliance PXV Goggles, powder day approved. // PHOTO: @mattpower // #FREESKIER #ThisIsSkiing #Skiing

We‚Äôre doubling down on this week‚Äôs giveaway, offering one winner the chance to snag a pair of @k2.skis Mindbender 99Ti or 98Ti Alliance skis, as well as two days of skiing for two people at @powdermountain in Utah. That's right, along with your brand spankin‚Äô new pair of planks, we'll be sending the winner and a friend on a two-day, two-night stay with Powder Mountain Getaways to put those new skis to good use across 8,464 acres of skiable terrain. Head over to FREESKIER.com to enter now. #FREESKIER #ThisIsSkiing #Skiing

The ski gods graced us with a picture-perfect early-season ski day for the first stop of the inaugural FREESKIER Buyer‚Äôs Guide Live Demo Tour at @VailMtn, Colorado. The sun was out and the stoke was fiery as skiers by the hundreds‚Äì‚Äìhungry to test out the best of this year‚Äôs skis from 20 different brands, including @armadaskis, @atomicski, @blizzardskis @dynastarskis, @Elanskis, @FactionSkis, @fischerski, @folsomskis, @head_ski, @rompskis, @RMUoutdoors, @Icelanticskis, @k2.skis, @kaestleski, @LibertySkis, @LineSkis, @nordicaski, @rossignolfreeride, @salomonfreeski and @volklskis_usa‚Äì‚Äìlined up at the base of Gondola One long before the lifts started spinning at 9 a.m. The inaugural event was a smashing success, giving hundreds of skiers the opportunity to try out the best skis of 2019-20 just in time for the holidays. We finished off the day with a proper apres party at @shakedownbarvail complete with gear giveaways from @PocSports and live music from Brother‚Äôs Keeper. Stay tuned for more from our next stop, Saturday, December 14 at @killingtonmtn. For more info on the rest of the tour, visit freeskier.com. #FREESKIER #ThisIsSkiing

@codytownsend is on a wholehearted quest to ski the "Fifty Classic Ski Descents of North America"‚Äîa coffee table fixture for many backcountry skiers‚Äîin just three years. He's over halfway done, but there's still much to do. Beyond a laser-focus on his ski mountaineering objectives, there's an assortment of gear that he's trusting to help him get the job done. In the Backcountry Issue (22.3), we profiled Townsend, as well as highlighted the equipment he's using on a daily basis, and both stories are now online. Take a look, read about Townsend and keep his @salomonfreeski boots, bindings and skis in mind should you need a new set-up for your own ski mountaineering objectives. // PHOTO: @ming.t.poon // LOGISTICS/LOCATION: @pointsnorthheli // #FREESKIER #ThisIsSkiing #Skiing

The @coppermtn stop marked the end of FREESKIER‚Äôs Inaugural Buyer‚Äôs Guide Demo Tour‚Äîwe know, we‚Äôve been going through the Kleenex and wiping up our tears, too. But, while the tour is over, we‚Äôre smiling look back at its success. We can‚Äôt thank the people of Colorado and Vermont, as well as @VailMtn, @KillingtonMtn and @CopperMtn and the brands that attended the demos‚Äî @4frnt_skis, @ArmadaSkis, @Amalgam_Skis, @AtomicSki, @BlizzardSkis, @DynastarSkis, @ElanSkis, @FactionSkis, @FischerSki, @FolsomSkis, @HEAD_Ski, @Icelantic_Skis, @J_Skis, @K2.Skis, @KaestleSki, @LibertySkis, @LineSkis, @NordicaSki, @RMUOutdoors, @Rossignol, @SalomonFreeski and @VolklSkis_USA‚Äìenough for participating and allowing us to bring this project to life. Neglin is a drinking game‚Äîa very hard drinking game. Don‚Äôt ever consider asking the question, ‚ÄúIs this that game called stump?‚Äù The repercussions will not be pretty. Neglin might sound foreign to you, but at @retallacklodge, it‚Äôs religion. The nights are long, indeed. Retallack is known for that. But, when morning arrives, hungover bullshit isn't tolerated. Everyone is up with the sun‚Äîstretching, eating a big breakfast, readying gear, planning out routes. The days are always long and full of opportunity. And powder. And the best lines of your life... // PHOTO: @eye_b_long // #FREESKIER #ThisIsSkiing #Skiing

At just 26 years old, @leoslemett has a lifetime worth of skiing accomplishments under his belt, but it‚Äôs the impactful experiences skiing has afforded him that keep him moving forward. // READ MORE about the Chamonix-born skier online at FREESKIER.com/stories // PHOTO: @blizzimages // #FREESKIER #ThisIsSkiing #Skiing

When @trevor_kennison was paralyzed from the waist down after a backcountry snowboarding accident four years ago, sit-skiing was just about the last thing on his mind. That is, until his sister encouraged him to give it a try. Just three years into sit-skiing, Kennison has established himself as one of the rowdiest adaptive athletes in the world after the 26-year-old dropped into the industry‚Äôs craziest ski and snowboard competition, Kings and Queens of Corbet‚Äôs @jacksonhole, last February. Sending it alongside some of the best skiers and snowboarders in the game, think @travisrice, @crazy_karl and two-time Queen @caite_zeliff, Kennison went where no sit-skier has gone before, proving the limit to this incredible competition does not exist. perPostData.comment: For everyone that‚Äôs ever participated in an action sport, they can probably remember landing their first 360. Regardless of what you‚Äôre riding, skis, snowboard, bike, skateboard, surfboard, a sit ski, or whatever else it‚Äôs a pretty big moment. @trevor_kennison stomped his first 3 today! ü§©ü§òüèºüé• @codywilderray
üßà @casablunt in the @wellslamontsnow 2019 Team Edit. Link in profile! üé∂ üîà @dlincognito
Casual park lap backy - @trevor_kennison at @winterparkresort üìπ @birkirving

1 shot. 8 skiers. 7 jumps. 1 rail. 3 days. About 50 takes.

With @_blastr‚Äôs unique perspectives in mind we designed and built this pump track at @sierra_at_tahoe this past May. While the single shot didn‚Äôt make the cut for #level1romance it still stands out as one of (if not THE) single most impressive shots of the year.

See the rest of what went down in the first ever all FPV ski film- FREEZR. Link in profile! #blastr #hypercine #freezr #fpv

üèÜ And congrats to our other big winner from this past weekend‚Äôs @powdermagazine awards- @wachstavision took home the coveted prize for Breakthrough Performance for his standout segment in #level1romance

Late last February @ahmetdadali called- ‚Äúthey‚Äôve got snow at the Olympic ruins in Sarajevo and I‚Äôm heading there to shoot tomorrow. It‚Äôs gonna be good! Can you send a filmer? Tomorrow?‚Äù It normally doesn‚Äôt work that way, but @danyakushnarevich came to the rescue and was able to hop on a flight the next t morning and join.

Ahmet was right- it WAS good, and the 4 long days of shooting turned into one of our favorite parts in #level1romance and the latest in Ahmet‚Äôs self-produced series- EuroVan Ventures Part 2.

Click the link in his profile and see what went down! üì∑ @ethanstonephoto

Rip Responsibly. New @wileymiller x @fattire edit dropping tomorrow!

#ripresponsibly 
#ski
#thenbeer
ü§Ø mute reverse mute late 1?!?! Welcoming the newest addition to the @wellslamontsnow team- @alexhallskiing - check the full 2019 Team Edit our now! Link in profile. üé∂üîà @dlincognito
Au naturale. @dunkadams corks one out for the 2019 @wellslamontsnow team edit- link in profile!
Job opening!!! We‚Äôre looking for some help in the Level 1 warehouse in Denver, CO. Link in bio for details.

The hype is real! After making an appearance at SuperUnknown X Finals back in 2013 @bmile180 turned some heads. The stars finally aligned for him join the crew for #level1romance and his contribution wasüëåüèº

Ski filmmaking can be equal parts art, science, skill, grit, and luck, among other things. The variables are infinite, but several times each year all of the pieces of the puzzle fall into place at once and leave us with smiles on our faces.

@stalmadison recounts this magic moment in üáØüáµ: ‚ÄúWhen timing and luck came together in what me by favorite shot of all time. The crashing pillow, the trick, and the aesthetic ofc but also that it was our last day shooting in Japan and the fact that this shot has been in my head for such a long time.‚Äù #level1romance üí•üçÑüôèüèº‚ò∫Ô∏è

@bmile180 x @_blastr x @level1

2019‚Äôs Whale Tail jump at @sierra_at_tahoe didn‚Äôt make the cut with so much other wild stuff between the 3 zones we shot, and only so much room to pack it into one movie... but damn did it result in some üî• shots!!!

3... 2... 1... üöÄ @laurentdm followed by @_blastr.  If you haven‚Äôt seen the full edit linked in our profile you‚Äôre missing out!!! The first ever full FPV edit is unlike anything you‚Äôve ever seen. üò≥

üèÜ Big congratulations and a high five to @kilbride95 for winning Best Jib at last night‚Äôs @powdermagazine video awards for this shot.

This beast of a rail sits outside of Denver, CO and was first scoped in the Spring of 2009. While many of our crews had stopped by to check it out over the years the spot‚Äôs many red flags discouraged them to the point where no one ever bothered to set it up. First off, the rail is goddamn massive- somewhere in the neighborhood of 70-80‚Äô and shoulder height off the stairs. Speed is an even more obvious issue since this oddly placed stairset goes to the top of a hill that drops quickly over the other side- with no clear inrun approach.

Keegan had a different vision, and 137 tries later- notably the single longest battle he‚Äôs ever fought with a feature- his skis tagged the last of the rail with a loud ‚Äòclang‚Äô as he slid off the end of it.

Lastly- it‚Äôs worth mentioning that this is one dozens of award-worthy heaters in Keegan‚Äôs part that also earned him a nomination for Best Male Performance! Not bad.

#level1romance

20 years of annual feature films and @kilbride95 is the first and only Level 1 athlete to take home 2 @powdermagazine awards... winner of Breakthrough Performance for 2017‚Äôs #level1habit and Best Jib for 2019‚Äôs #level1romance üèÜüèÜüí™üèºüôåüèº
üî•üî•üî• New @wellslamontsnow Team Edit drops tomorrow! Featuring @w_berman @kilbride95 @alexhallskiing @dunkadams @casablunt @dahrkgram and @tannerrainville üé∂üîà @dlincognito

üî•üî•üî• NEW @wellslamontsnow 2019 Team Edit now live! Link in profile. Featuring @tannerrainville along with @casablunt @w_berman @alexhallskiing @dunkadams @dahrkgram and @kilbride95 üé∂üîà @dlincognito
No goggle pow shredding. Double black diamond move by @stalmadison. ‚õÑÔ∏èüáØüáµ #level1romance

Last year‚Äôs SuperUnknown XVI Winner @blake_wilson_ joined our shoot in @sierra_at_tahoe last May and proved that he could hold it down with the best in the business. Who‚Äôs going to follow in his footsteps in 2020?

Details and info on #superunknownxvii linked in our profile!

Superunknown.level1.ski

This is the closest approximation to what it would look like to follow @dahrkgram off this cliff on a trajectory that would put you about 40‚Äô past the landing. üé• @_blastr
Link to the full edit in our profile.

Santa spreading Holiday cheer and droppin‚Äô @wellslamontsnow gloves and mitts to girls and boys! üå≤ üéÖ Did he leave anything under your tree this morning? If not, use that Xmas money and pick up a pair at www.level1.ski - link in profile!

üòÆ A perspective on skiing unlike anything you‚Äôve seen before! @_blastr x @level1

Link to the full edit in our profile!

@ljstrenio closing the gate on his way out of this year‚Äôs trip to Finland.

While LJ‚Äôs history of Level 1 trips to Finland isn‚Äôt necessarily a good one (see 2012‚Äôs Sunny for illustrative purposes) it‚Äôs certainly been a quality over quantity situation and we‚Äôre glad to have a couple heaters of a cameo in this years film! üôåüèº #level1romance

üî®üî®üî® New @wellslamontsnow 2019 Team Edit is up! Link in profile. Featuring the dream team of @dahrkgram along with @kilbride95 @w_berman @alexhallskiing @dunkadams @tannerrainville and @casablunt üé∂ üîà @dlincognito

Rip Responsibly. Bold Lines with Distinct Notes of Freestyle Flavor.

In partnership with Level 1, @fattire presents a 3.5-minute brew of bold lines with distinct notes of freestyle flavor. Filmed around Montana and British Columbia, Rip Responsibly portrays @wileymiller's pow sensibility.

See the full edit on Fat Tire‚Äôs IGTV!

#ripresponsibly
#skiing
#thenbeer
All ‚õΩÔ∏è no brakes! @kcdeane put the pedal to the metal this past winter- buckle up and tune in to his  season edit. Link in profile!
Style lord. @noahalbaladejo
Fine line. @wileymiller at @eaglepassheliski for Pleasure üì∑ @anikulapu

ü§òüèºGo big or go home!  @kcdeane brings it back to the hard rock adrenaline-fueled approach to skiing of yesteryear with his 2019 season edit, brought to you by @eddiebauer.

Link to the full edit in our profile. üéµ @hauntthenation

Level 1 is excited to announce the 17th annual installment of SuperUnknown! We‚Äôll be heading back East to @carinthiaparks April 6th through the 12th with 11 Finalists from all over the world, including 10 Men and 1 Woman. Start stacking shots for your entry today and head to SuperUnknown.level1.ski for details.

Link in profile! #SuperUnknkwnXVII
Last chance to get your Holiday gifts! Order before midnight (MST) to guarantee delivery before Christmas. Our elves are working tirelessly to make sure you get your package in time. üì¶

data.name: Method Mag
data.biography:
Real Snowboarding 
Since 1994
#holdfasttweakhard

perPostData.comment: WOP SOLO. üó£@niels_schack brings the good times and gnarly lines to the streets of Finland with @dr.luti @sparrowknox @ceeswille. Watch it now on Method, it will make your day! #wopsolo #wop #finland #holdfasttweakhard
We‚Äôve lost a real special one. Rest easy Jaeger Bailey üåπ Thoughts and love to all his family and friends.

It‚Äôs here! The highly anticipated and acclaimed #SuzyGreenberg270TheMovie from @sleepystevens. It‚Äôs currently playing on our homepage player staring Scotty alongside a host of other shredders from legends to the futures. Sunday just got sick af! üìπ @jesseburtner #suzygreenberg #holdfasttweakhard

@brust_studio full movie is now online for good. If you missed it‚Äôs 24hrs online premiere you can head over to Method now and watch it! Featuring @skafideep (here) @niels_schack @bastiensturma @maxzebe @9uilhem @indiana_rimes @louislabertrande @0lurec. üìπ @guillaumesturma @8hoursbefore #bruststudio #brust #holdfasttweakhard

@backstromkevin hitting one straight out the park! @snowparklaax
üìπ @coldenrand #homerun #snowparklaax #holdfasttweakhard
@renerinnekangas celebrating Christmas the best way he knows how with a fire line to the lake. üìπ @eeroettala #christmasjibline #holdfasttweakhard

POTW : We take a closer look at the @unionbindingco Scott Stevens Contact Pro Bindings. This binding maintains the Union philosophy of minimal binding-to-board contact for less interference with your boards natural flex pattern. It also provides unmatched dampening and a surfy ride whilst still offering support and control. @sleepystevens adds a special touch with the top sheet sticker graphic and a clean finish with no highback adjuster (not necessary if ya wanna ride like Scotty). Swipe to see the binding. Hit the link in our story for all the details. #unionbindings #unionscottstevenspro #holdfasttweakhard
This Kiwi loves a pool day! @peppinostewart down at the pool for @rustytoothbrush #projecthijinks. #poolday #rustytoothbrush #holdfasttweakhard

Suzy Greenberg 270 The Movie is live and packed with brain expanding moves from the one and only @sleepystevens and friends. Watch it now over on Method. üìπ @_shmohawk. @capitasupercorp @unionbindingco @coalheadwear #suzygreenberg270themovie #holdfasttweakhard

That‚Äôs a thumbs up from us too @lucas.netnak, back 3 mid dfd for @notion_snow‚Äôs latest movie ‚ÄòPinot Grigio‚Äô! üî• You can watch it in full over on Method. #notionsnow #pinotgrigio #holdfasttweakhard

POTW : we take a closer look at the 2020 @bataleonsnowboards Evil Twin Snowboard. This award winning freestyle park board has stood the test of time, year in year out offering the perfect board to shred every feature in the park as well as taking it to the whole mountain. Utilising the Twin 3BT base on a medium camber profile, this board is fun and playful whilst still offering you that dark side to shred fast and powerful. Find out all about this latest version over on Method now. @futanarideath showing you where this board is most comfortable. Link in story. #bataleonsnowboards #bataleoneviltwin #potw #holdfasttweakhard

@kyleknndy opens up @theinteriorplainproject RETROGRADE team movie with some bangers. Head over to Method now to watch the all the team throw it down in the full movie. üìπ @trevoranthonyphoto @d_pergrin üì∑ @evanpiercephoto #interiorplainproject #retrograde #holdfasttweakhard

DARK MATTER - a snowboard movie staring @travisrice and @eliaselhardt dropping crazy lines in Alaska! It does get much better than that! He‚Äôs one from Travis. Directed by @curtismorgan and now available on online at Apple TV and iTunes. #darkmattermovie #alaska #holdfasttweakhard

Oh what a night! The 8th edition of @rockarail was one for the books. @simonpircher here claiming the ‚Äòbest trick‚Äô with 5050 up the a-frame to gap backlip ü§Ø. üì∑ @willradulascott #rockarail #rockarail2019 #holdfasttweakhard @volcomsnow @bluetomato @redbullsnow @gopro

@eliaselhardt poppin‚Äô Alaskan lines like a boss! You can watch more of this epic shredding from Elias and @travisrice in #DarkMatterMovie now playing on the internet via iTunes and other sources. Link in their bio. #alaska #darkmatter #holdfasttweakhard
When the snow is at low tide... @jacco_bos_ in the classic Method Merch piece, the Box Logo Crew. Tap to shop. üìπ @tomshapiro_ #methodmerch #methodboxlogocrew #holdfasttweakhard

POTW: A brand new model from @lobstersnowboards, this is the Shifter! Their first board without 3BT but incorporating Sidekick for lofted edges after the contact points. This is a freestyle twin board to shred everywhere! Swipe to see. Find out more on Method. #lobstersnowboards #lobstershifter #holdfasttweakhard

@traktoroff has been working overtime in @revelstoke poppin‚Äô pillows and sending it into the deep for his latest full part. Watch it in full over on Method. @shred_bots #workingovertime #johanrosen #holdfasttweakhard

The McMorris brothers spread their wings and go from shredding the streets of Finland with @eeroettala to Alaska lines! Check their movie ‚ÄòBrothers McMorris‚Äô on Method now. @markmcmorris showing you how it‚Äôs done in Alaska. @craigmcmorris @redbullsnow #brothersmcmorris #holdfasttweakhard

@sagekotsenburg‚Äôs full part is truly a pure JOY to watch! Deep in the backcountry Sage‚Äôs riding has a sense of legendary parts from the early 2000s with his own fresh style and precision thrown in. Full Part from @joysnowboardfilm playing on Method now. EnJOY! #joysnowboardfilm #sagekotsenburg #holdfasttweakhard

@scotebrown surprising the @dope_industries boys as he pops a double backie through the trees for Hi8us. Staring @don__wheeler @betterthanthepolice alongside a bunch of other rad dudes. Watch it now over on Method. üìπ @whereswalcer #dopeindustries #hi8us #holdfasttweakhard

POTW : We take a closer look at the 2020 @deeluxeboots ORIGINAL Boot. With a nod to the past, the Original provides a glimpse of the future. A soft freestyle boot blends an old school appearance with sophisticated tech. Super comfy, exceptional board feel and dampening in a strong holding classic lace up boot. Find out more over on Method. Swipe to see. Link in story. @simonpircher puts it to the test here in the streets. üì∑ @sebimadlener #deeluxeboots #deeluxeoriginal #potw #holdfasttweakhard

@rockarail 2019 photos and recap are LIVE on Methodmag.com. Swipe for a selection and hit the link in our bio for more. Such an awesome event and once again all the riders sent it! üôèüî•ü§Ø Photos by @willradulascott @theo.acworth #rockarail #rockarail2019 #thehague #railjam #holdfasttweakhard

The brand new Method LINES Hoodie, comes in this awesome blue colourway, mid-lightweight 80/20 cotton/poly blend, ribbed cuffs and waistband with thumb holes and embroidered best logo with sewn stripes. Swipe for a close up, tap to shop. #methodmerch #methodlineshoodie #holdfasttweakhard #worldwideshippingüåé

Method Mag 20.3!  @jpminibike shot by @bacha.photo in Idaho. This man is responsible for some of snowboarding‚Äôs finest visual work, and we‚Äôre psyched to finally put him on the front page, powsurfing! OUT NOW! #methodmag #printlives #holdfasttweakhard

POTW : We take a closer look at the all-terrain vehicle boot by @vanssnow, the @patmoore Infuse Boot. POTW : We take a closer look at the @unionbindingco Scott Stevens Contact Pro Bindings. This binding maintains the Union philosophy of minimal binding-to-board contact for less interference with your boards natural flex pattern. data.name: Outside
data.biography:
The cutting edge of adventure, fitness, and culture in the outdoors. DM @graysonschaffer to be featured.
#livebravely

perPostData.comment:
‚úç: @maddieladube | Seven years ago, @erikcooperadventurist competed in the Mongol Derby, the world's longest horse race (one thousand kilometers) on notoriously angsty, semi-wild Mongolian horses. ‚ÄúI barely survived,‚Äù he laughs. ‚†Ä
‚†Ä
During the competition, he learned about the nomadic Tsaatan people, one of the last groups on the planet that uses reindeer as their primary mode of transportation. Also known as the Dukha people (or reindeer riders), the Tsaatan people are one of the smallest ethnic groups on the planet; according to Cooper, the tribe is currently only about 44 families strong. ‚†Ä
‚†Ä
Since the Mongol Derby, for which he now works half the year, Cooper has developed a strong relationship with the tribe, running expeditions for adventurers interested in getting to know the Tsaatan lifestyle (and bringing doctors and veterinarians for the tribe to use at their disposal).‚†Ä
‚†Ä
Reaching the tribe isn‚Äôt for the faint of heart: it requires an off-road ride in rickety Russian military vans followed by two days on horseback through high mountain valleys pocked with bogs that could swallow horses whole. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs essentially ‚ÄòThe Never Ending Story,‚Äô‚Äù says Cooper. (It‚Äôs no cakewalk when you reach the valley, either‚Äînights are spent in tipis and days are spent working, herding, and foraging to assist the families.) But Cooper‚Äîand his expeditionists‚Äîsay it's worth the effort (aptly summed up by Cooper's reaction upon seeing a reindeer rider in person for the first time: "Holy shit, this is real.‚Äù)‚†Ä
‚†Ä
 For people who have dreams of riding Rudoph in their lifetimes, Cooper says it's like riding a horse with a twist: "The one hazard is the antlers." You can learn more about his adventures at @erikcooperadventurist.

üì∑‚úèÔ∏è @blake__gordon | The high Himalayan peaks are not known for soft powdery turns. That didn‚Äôt stop North Face athletes @mikeyarno, @griffpost, and @christinalusti from attempting a 7,000-meter peak, in the Annapurna region, that‚Äôs rarely climbed and which has never been skied. The crew won‚Äôt say its name for fear that another daring ski crew will swoop in and poach their line. ‚õ∞Ô∏è
There is a lot of uncertainty and risk on a trip like this. But a stellar crew with solid skills and mountain sense made every step enjoyable‚Äîexcept maybe the part where we crossed miles of glacial moraine with 65lb packs and skis. But even that wasn‚Äôt so bad
‚õ∞Ô∏è
Ultimately, the weather and snow pack didn‚Äôt allow for a successful ascent. But as they say in sports: There‚Äôs always next year.

üì∑ @chrisburkard ‚úè @maura_fox | After half a decade of legislative holdups, New Mexico‚Äôs White Sands National Monument has officially been designated a national park. ***
Located 220 miles south of Albuquerque, White Sands is the largest dune field in the world and is so expansive that it can be seen from space. It was established as a national monument in 1933, and since its inception has attracted more visitors than any other National Parks Service site in New Mexico, according to a statement from the office of @senatormartinheinrich . ‚ÄúThis is a pretty prestigious recognition of White Sands, one of New Mexico's most remarkable natural wonders,‚Äù said Heinrich, who introduced the bill to Congress with U.S. Representative @reptorressmall in March 2019. ***
Starting this spring, visitors to the 275-square-mile stretch of rolling dunes will now be able to hike and camp in its backcountry, sled down sandy hills, and stargaze‚Äîwithout the interruptions of missile tests. The designation was included in the National Defense Authorization Act (the 2020 defense spending bill), which was passed through the U.S. Senate on December 17 and signed into law yesterday by @realdonaldtrump. The reason it‚Äôs a provision in Congress‚Äôs defense bill is because the former monument shares land with the White Sands Missile Range (WSMR), a U.S. military weapons testing area and the site of the first atomic bomb detonation. . .  READ THE WHOLE STORY AT OUTSIDEOINLINE.COM
@stefaniemillinger | Ski patrol‚Äôs not gonna like this.
@mitch_explores | Black ice on Abraham Lake. It's a rare phenomenon in the wild.

üì∏: @toddantonyphoto ‚úç: @maddieladube | This year‚Äôs been a big one for the Cholitas Escaladoras. The Bolivian climbing group made waves in January 2019 when two of their members‚ÄîAna L√≠a Gonzales Mague√±o and Elena Quispe Tincuta‚Äîreached the summit of Mount Aconcagua, the highest mountain in the Americas... in skirts. And just last week, a film about their experience, called ‚ÄúCholitas,‚Äù premiered at the @mendifilm festival in Spain. ‚†Ä
‚†Ä
The climbing group‚Äôs aim is to make visible the indigenous women that have been pushed to the margins of Bolivian society since Spanish occupation. (Until as recently as the turn of the twenty-first century, cholitas were banned from even entering certain public spaces, a cultural trend that began to shift along with events like Evo Morales‚Äôs first election and Bolivia‚Äôs conversion to a plurinational state.) That‚Äôs where the polleras (skirts) and aguayos (shawls) come in‚Äînot only to celebrate the beauty of Aymara cholita culture, but proving, yet again, that anything men can do, women can do in dresses. ‚†Ä
‚†Ä
To see these images in print, head to Outside‚Äôs December 2019 issue. ‚†Ä
‚†Ä
Photo One: The Aconcagua expeditionists. From left: Lidia Huayllas Estrada, Dora Mague√±o Machaca, Ana L√≠a Gonzales Mague√±o, Cecilia Llusco Ala√±a, and Elena Quispe Tincuta on Bolivia‚Äôs Huayna Potos√≠ ‚†Ä
‚†Ä
Photos Two and Three: The women on Huayna Potos√≠‚Äôs Zongo Glacier.
@alexstrohl | Through the depths of Alaska‚Äôs Knik Glacier

üì∏: @double.zee | In the spring of 2019, @mikeposner ‚Äîthe Grammy-nominated pop star you know from hits like ‚ÄúI Took a Pill in Ibiza‚Äù and ‚ÄúCooler Than Me‚Äù‚Äîdecided to walk across America. 2,851 miles later, he sat down with @caitlingiddings to talk about grief, music, and that one time he got bit by a rattlesnake and relearned to walk. Link in bio.
üì∏ @tedhesser captured @handsomerobinson on a Sedona, Arizona, highline at sunset.

‚úè @graysonschaffer | Equal parts landscape art and escapist daydream, @ChrisBurkard‚Äôs self-published ‚ÄúAt Glacier‚Äôs End‚Äù chronicles decade the San Luis Obispo‚Äìbased photographer spent traversing Iceland by Cessna. It‚Äôs 150 pages‚Äîco-written with @63mph‚Äîof abstract glacierscapes, blue-grey silt mazes at the mouths of rivers, and towering faces of calving ice walls. In the prologue, Burkard describes first seeing Iceland from the air: ‚ÄúVisually it made no sense. It was a kaleidoscope of color breaking apart lie arteries full of blood and disintegrating into the ocean.‚Äù The book is available at Burkard's website.
@brentbielmann | @guitamega kicking off the new year with one of the most insane barrels anyone can remember at Pipeline.

In a world where six-second video is the benchmark for attention span, the new photo book Tarpon‚Äîpublished by Yeti coolers and produced and edited by Talweg Creative‚Äîswims in exactly the opposite direction. The coffee-table art book is a 130-page deep dive into the insular world of some of the most obsessive fishermen on the planet and includes essays from Diana Rudolph, @shallowwaterexpeditions, Charles Gaines, and long-time Outside contributors Randy Wayne White and Thomas McGuane. You can find it at Yeti.com.
@stephenshelesky | This morning‚Äôs sunrise bringing the reminder that you must be present to win this game. Epic conditions about the clouds in Jackson.üèÇ¬†@randystrand3

Photo @donaldmiralle | ‚ÄòTis the season, sharing is caring! One year ago today, a unique swell provided XXL surf for over 3 days for surfers on the California coast, including these two chargers splitting a massive peak at Mavericks üåäüåäüåä

üì∑ @_cammcleod_, ‚úèÔ∏è @graysonschaffer | The dirty secret of ski films is that the people who make them generally have to spend weeks waiting around in order to get the perfect conditions: those precious few hours after a storm when the clouds are just breaking, the sun is shining, and the pow is flying. But former NorAm racer and perennial Warren Miller ski star @marcuscaston has a different take, which is to ski the snow you have not the snow you want. Caston is famous for his ‚ÄúReturn of the Turn‚Äù web series, in which he frequently skis GS turns over crud, moguls, and anything else. It‚Äôs like that scene from Better Off Dead: ‚ÄúYou just go that way really fast, and if something gets in your way‚Ä¶turn.‚Äù ‚õ∑Ô∏è The latest installment of the series follows Caston, @jonsbert, and @c0nnery to Engelberg, Switzerland, where the conditions are hard, the fondu is hot, and the beer is cold. Link to the film in Caston‚Äôs profile.

Happy holidays, Outsiders! To celebrate the end of another year lived bravely, we‚Äôre giving away a $250 gift card to REI along with an Outside print subscription for you and a friend to upgrade your 2020 adventures. What gear or trip would you use it towards? Let us know in the comments and enter to win at the link in our bio by 12pm EST on Monday, 12/9.

Don't make gift shopping anymore complicated than it needs to be. We teamed up with @getcairn to create three gift bundles‚Äîfor the travelers, water lovers, and gym rats in your life‚Äîto make holiday shopping easy. The best part? You can save up to 25 percent off retail prices on everything in these boxes. Learn more at link in bio.

@nevernotcollective // The Pretty Strong trailer is live! What started as the nugget of an idea over a decade ago in @etteloc‚Äôs brain has officially turned into a feature-length climbing film that showcases ten badass ladies climbing all over the world. Over the last two-and-a-half years from launching the Kickstarter, shooting, and now post-production, we've experienced dozens of sleepless nights, overwhelming self-doubt, incredible highs, crushing lows, constant questioning of why we did this to ourselves, and long stretches where we just didn't know if we could finish this movie.
üí•üí•üí•
But thanks to your amazing support, we DID make this movie, and you know what? We are damn proud of it. Watch the trailer and please spread the word to your friends, families, climbing partners, and random strangers you meet on the street.
üí•üí•üí•
Thanks to all the extraordinary athletes who let us follow them around, ask too many questions, and generally annoy them for months at a time: @sheneenagins @katiebirdlambert @fausey @hazel_findlay @jessagoebel @annaliinalaitinen @laryarce @dailaojeda @feryrodriguez_climbing @almaestebanavalos
üí•üí•üí•
Pretty Strong premieres January 10, 2020, at Colorado's @BoulderTheater, and after that there will be Pretty Strong film tour stops across the country and abroad. Check out the @NeverNotCollective website for more information on how to show Pretty Strong in your town!
@sylvanslacks | Watch closesly as @bendicko101 threads the needle on the space net built by @hownottohighline in Moab's Fruitbowl last week. That's confidence.

üì∏: @sofia_jaramillo5 ‚úç: @kyehalpin | I've felt a deep connection to the Teton Range for as long as I can remember. The mountains are present in every facet of my life‚Äînot only in my professional career as an athlete and an illustrator, but also in my personal day-to-day. As the snow begins to fall in Jackson, I'm already looking forward to brisk morning hikes on Teton Pass and waffles at the top of the tram with friends. ‚†Ä
‚†Ä
 To learn more about adventurers who love living in Jackson Hole, click the link in our bio.

Also known as the Dukha people (or reindeer riders), the Tsaatan people are one of the smallest ethnic groups on the planet; according to Cooper, the tribe is currently only about 44 families strong. ‚†Ä
‚†Ä
Since the Mongol Derby, for which he now works half the year, Cooper has developed a strong relationship with the tribe, running expeditions for adventurers interested in getting to know the Tsaatan lifestyle (and bringing doctors and veterinarians for the tribe to use at their disposal).‚†Ä
‚†Ä
Reaching the tribe isn‚Äôt for the faint of heart: it requires an off-road ride in rickety Russian military vans followed by two days on horseback through high mountain valleys pocked with bogs that could swallow horses whole. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs essentially ‚ÄòThe Never Ending Story,‚Äô‚Äù says Cooper. (It‚Äôs no cakewalk when you reach the valley, either‚Äînights are spent in tipis and days are spent working, herding, and foraging to assist the families.) But Cooper‚Äîand his expeditionists‚Äîsay it's worth the effort (aptly summed up by Cooper's reaction upon seeing a reindeer rider in person for the first time: "Holy shit, this is real.‚Äù)‚†Ä
‚†Ä
 For people who have dreams of riding Rudoph in their lifetimes, Cooper says it's like riding a horse with a twist: "The one hazard is the antlers." You can learn more about his adventures at @erikcooperadventurist.
@brentbielmann | @guitamega kicking off the new year with one of the most insane barrels anyone can remember at Pipeline.

Located just 80 miles from Yellowstone, and situated between two ski areas, Bridger Bowl and Big Sky Resort, Bozeman is a winter mecca for outdoor adventure. What‚Äôs @myshellparker's secret weapon when it comes to gear?
"I would say my layering system is super important to me. I‚Äôm the type of person who starts sweating the second I start moving, so I have to make sure my layers are dialed, so I don‚Äôt freeze or overheat. My socks are a huge aspect of that. A nice wool sock from @darntoughvermont keeps my feet dry."
Read Michelle's full interview on Powder.com
Produced in partnership with @darntoughvermont

Some days, everything feels heavy. Your quads feel like lead, your pack may as well be filled with bricks, and riding lifts at the resort sounds like sweet relief from your losing battle with gravity. Maybe you skipped a few too many gym sessions this fall (you‚Äôre not alone), or maybe you‚Äôre carrying an excessively heavy setup. If the latter sounds like your problem, a few light pieces of gear can seriously minimize skintrack ass-dragging.
Check out our review of some ultralight gear to lighten your load on Powder.com

Big mountain terrain hovers above a rolling playground at Taos, the New Mexican resort at the southernmost tip of the Rockies. The terrain here forces you to be on your game, and when it dumps, Taos receives some of the driest snow in the country. Pack a snorkel‚Äîon truly deep days, you'll actually need it.

The community that has developed around Taos is distinct in many ways from other centers of ski gravity. Native American and Mexican cultures weave through the locals' shared passion for the mountain in unexpected ways, making for a ski experience unlike any in North America. See the full episode of Passing Through: Taos on Powder.com
üì∏: @dash_913

On the cover: @lindseyvonn, age 7. Inside, you'll find our 2020 Accessory Guide, the greatest female ski racer in history reckons with heartbreak and recovery, we disappear into old Japan, and the clandestine practice of thinning glades is brought into the light.
Subscribe for the most essential stories and photos in skiing and we'll get a copy in your hands ASAP.
#PowderToThePeople

Tucked out of the way of the traffic jams of the Cottonwood Canyons, Sundance Resort is a breath of fresh mountain air. Free of crowds, but overflowing with the goods, this resort should be on your radar.
See the full episode of Passing Through on Powder.com
Paid Partnership with @visitutah

Mammoth is getting hammered right now. It has more open terrain than any resort in the country as of last weekend. That means @chrisbenchetler is out skiing all day, and when varying light conditions hit, he's wearing his @dragonalliance Lumalens goggles. Click the link in bio to find out why.
Paid Partnership with @dragonalliance
#PowderToThePeople

In case you missed it, the November issue of the 48th volume of The Skier‚Äôs Magazine has arrived. It's time to hit the slopes. On the cover: @peltski and @bucksnorts, shot in Steamboat Springs, Colorado, by @noahwetzel. Inside, you'll find our 2020 Apparel Guide, Ali Meiners rerouting her life to Alaska to build on her father's legacy, the story of an Amish ski community, and a tale of life and death in Pemberton, BC.
Subscribe for the most essential stories and photos in skiing and we'll get a copy in your hands ASAP.
#PowderToThePeople

Catch any bluebird powder days yet this season? If not let us rev up that stoke engine. Here's @doosli slashing his way through the Monday blues. üì∏: @marliicia
See the rest of the November Shooting Gallery on Powder.com and in print!

Treat yourself and meet @katieburrelltv, the director and star of Dream Job, the comedy documentary by indie filmmaker Colleen Gentemann that‚Äôs been blasting through the season‚Äôs regularly scheduled ski films.

As a comedian who plays an average skier in the film (skillfully designed to highlight the wild talent of pros Christina Lustenberger, Leah Evans, and Diny Harrison), Burrell became an a-typical ski hero. We sat down with her to talk about Dream Job‚Äôs success and her road to creativity. Link in bio, people. You know the drill. #powdertothepeople

Skiing at Brian Head Resort is like skiing on the surface of Mars. But this southern Utah resort, located just miles from the iconic red rocks of Cedar Breaks National Monument and Zion National Park, is the highest in the state, with a base at 9,600 feet. The air is thin up there and the snow is dry, making Brian Head a must-visit on powder days. The best part? Without the notorious crowds endemic to the Wasatch, you can have fresh turns all day. The mountain is chock-full of expert terrain, the best of which you must hike to. It can be tricky with the altitude, maybe it‚Äôs best to stay a while and acclimate. Better set that out-of-office message.

Watch this episode of Passing Through and make your way to Brian Head. You‚Äôll be happy you did.
Paid Partnership with @visitutah 
#PowderToThePeople

@redresort kicked off 2020 by firing on all cylinders, officially opening its brand new Topping Creek expansion! This expansion at RED provides 300 acres, 1000 vertical feet, a new chairlift and 7 additional runs, bumping them into the Top 10 for Total Skiable Acres in North America and #1 for Most Acres Per Skier. It's #AllFriendsOnAPowder this winter at RED in Rossland, BC.
Paid Partnership with @redresort

@ak_rendezvous was built with a precise vision. Inside the lodge, there‚Äôs a spot where skiers can look out a window with perfect views of the Rendezvous‚Äô quintessential zones: Mount Tiekel to the northwest, Three Pigs to the southwest, and the summits of Mount Billy Mitchell, Loneliness, and Happiness to the south.
Photo: @davidreddick 
Read the Powder Profile of Ali Meiners on Powder.com
#PowderToThePeople

Dragon has set a new standard for what a goggle can accomplish. Discover what increased vision can do for you. Discover the PXV goggle.
